meanings.sent1: The garden was plenteous with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's fields were plenteous with ripe crops.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was plenteous with delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as plenteous as a flowing river.
meanings.sent5: The forest was plenteous with chirping birds and rustling leaves.

meanings.sent1: The supermarket shelves were plenteous with fresh produce.
meanings.sent2: The library was plenteous with books on various topics.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was plenteous with glittering jewels.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as plenteous as a never-ending stream.
meanings.sent5: The sky was plenteous with twinkling stars on a clear night.

meanings.sent1: The generous donor was plenteous in giving to those in need.
meanings.sent2: The fertile soil was plenteous in producing bountiful harvests.
meanings.sent3: The fountain was plenteous in spraying water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was as plenteous as a vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sun was plenteous in warming the earth on a summer day.
